titles.title: For the relief of Maria Del Refugio Plascencia and Alfredo Plascencia-Lopez.
For the relief of Maria Del Refugio Plascencia and Alfredo Plascencia-Lopez.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: Declares that Maria Del Refugio Plascencia and Alfredo Plascencia-Lopez shall be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence upon filing the appropriate application.
